basics.name: Jose Rubio
basics.label: Junior Full Stack ML Engineering
basics.summary: Experienced data scientist with a proven track record of optimizing production processes in manufacturing using machine learning and cloud technologies. Delivers actionable insights, improves efficiency, and reduces downtime..

work.name: Tech Startup
work.summary: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing front-end code to ensure smooth user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

work.name: Innovative Solutions
work.summary: Assisting in the development and maintenance of software applications using Python and Django. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and timely delivery of software solutions.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Worked closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Participated in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.

work.name: Web Agency
work.summary: Assisted in developing client websites and applications. Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Real-Time Production Monitoring
description: This dashboard, built with React and Streamlit, helps teams make smarter decisions for smoother production.
It visualizes data in real-time, revealing bottlenecks and trends, and uses a machine learning model to predict project completion times.
highlights: This project is built with React and Streamlit, providing a user-friendly interface for monitoring production data.
Utilizes machine learning (Scikit-learn) to predict project completion times based on historical data.
Integrates with AWS services for data storage and processing.

projects.name: Real-Time Production Cost
description: This real-time platform empowers businesses to optimize costs through data-driven insights,
identifying inefficiencies and enabling timely adjustments for increased profitability.
highlights: This project deepened my expertise in data-driven decision-making, cloud technologies, machine learning, and data pipelines.
I gained experience with AWS services, honed my machine learning skills, and learned to effectively communicate complex data insights through visualizations.

projects.name: Real-Time Crypto Predictor
description: Powered by clustering, RNNs, and Binance API data.
The system demonstrably improved trading efficiency and reduced risk through timely alerts and optimized entry/exit points.
highlights: This project demanded a comprehensive skill set, encompassing machine learning principles, RNN expertise, clustering algorithms, data preprocessing, Python programming, API integration, AWS Lambda deployment, and Streamlit dashboard development.
My role encompassed model development and training, clustering analysis, feature engineering, data preprocessing, system integration, and deployment & monitoring.
